Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION
REFERRED TO CRIME VICTIMS, CRIME AND CORRECTION

Title: Provides for automatic issuance of identification cards to incarcerated individuals and assistance with obtaining copies of certain documents
Summary: Provides for automatic issuance of identification cards to incarcerated individuals and assistance with obtaining copies of any documents needed to apply for identification cards, including, but not limited to, an incarcerated individual's social security card and birth certificate.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the correction law, in relation to providing for automatic issuance of identification cards to incarcerated individuals and assistance with obtaining copies of certain documents
